sentence: She most recently was a legislative policy staffer for Rep. Debbie Lesko (R-Ariz.).
title: Washington weighs Ukraine aid

sentence: Rep. Debbie Lesko, an Arizona Republican, said her state has been on standard time for nearly 40 years.
author: Ariana Figueroa
title: Congress hates changing the clocks just like everyone else

sentence: By U.S. Reps. Debbie Lesko and Dan Newhouse It is increasingly clear on issues ranging from energy independence to national security that Arizona’s priorities are America’s priorities.
author: Debbie Lesko and Dan Newhouse
title: Western U.S. has a voice to break through the D.C. bureaucracy
